meanings.sent1: The bullheaded child refused to eat his vegetables no matter what.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her bullheaded refusal to compromise on important matters.
meanings.sent3: The bullheaded cat insisted on sleeping in the dog's bed every night.
meanings.sent4: His bullheaded determination to climb the mountain despite the storm impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The bullheaded old man's refusal to use a computer made him miss out on so much.

meanings.sent1: Despite the challenges, the bullheaded athlete never gave up on his dream.
meanings.sent2: Her bullheaded focus on her goals helped her achieve success in her career.
meanings.sent3: The bullheaded squirrel kept trying to reach the bird feeder no matter what.
meanings.sent4: His bullheaded commitment to his principles inspired those around him.
meanings.sent5: The bullheaded explorer refused to turn back, determined to reach the hidden treasure.

meanings.definition: Unwilling to change one's opinion or course of action
meanings.sent1: The bullheaded manager insisted on following the outdated procedures.
meanings.sent2: She was so bullheaded about her favorite restaurant that she never tried anything new.
meanings.sent3: The bullheaded clock refused to tick in the opposite direction.
meanings.sent4: His bullheaded refusal to listen to advice led to his downfall.
meanings.sent5: The bullheaded student stuck to his incorrect answer, unwilling to consider other possibilities.
